Derived from steeping toxic highland plum pits in refined grain alcohols, this clear tonic slowly shuts down the imbiber’s senses.

 **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 30 minutes; **Stage 1** [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7), –3 to all Perception checks (1 minute); **Stage 2** dazzled, [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8), –5 to all Perception checks (1 minute); **Stage 3** [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1), deafened, –5 to all Perception checks (5 minutes)
